creator: yannick@atomixmp3.com
text:
Each time I try to load the phpmodule 4.1.x or 4.2 beta, apache sent error 
while launching, "File not found".

Or my DLL file is stroed on a simple directory : "d:\" so i am sure of my load 
module syntax instruction !

Please advice :)

PHP needs to be updated before the ISAPI dll will work with Apache 2--check the mailing lists on 
php.net for more info. Until then, PHP still works fine in CGI mode.
creator: sam@netcity.co.uk
slive@apache.org
text: In any case, this is a PHP issue, not an Apache HTTP Server issue.
